summary: Completed comprehensive testing of PoncikFocus cozy study app with both backend API and frontend UI testing. App is functional with minor issues.

minor_issues.issue: Returns 200 status code instead of expected 201 for resource creation
minor_issues.impact: Functionality works but status code inconsistency

minor_issues.issue: Had MongoDB ObjectId serialization error, resolved after backend restart
minor_issues.impact: Endpoint was temporarily failing with 520 error

minor_ui_issues.issue: Ad modal doesn't appear when timer is stopped after short duration

passed_tests: Landing page loads with Poncik mascot and Google login button
Backend API /api/ root endpoint returns correct response
Backend API /api/music/tracks returns 6 music tracks (after restart)
Auth /api/auth/me returns user data with session token
Todo CRUD operations working with authentication
Focus session start/end flow working with credit rewards
Dashboard loads for authenticated user with timer, todos, music player
Navigation to Shop, Community, Profile, Settings pages working
action_item_for_main_agent: Minor fix needed: Ensure ad modal appears for short timer sessions. Update POST /api/todos to return 201 status code instead of 200.
